text: @judypapineau @GovernorTomWolf What is the point???  Do you not understand basic science?  Hospitals are not overwhelmed and the infection SHOULD be passed around to achieve herd immunity, where 70% of people have antibodies. We were flattening the curve, not eliminating it.  Educate yourself!!
